1903139.qualifier:
1-Night Spa Break - Rate includes the following:
  • Accommodations as selected
  • Full use of the wet area at The Bath House on site
  • 45-minute treatment per guest
  • Two-course lunch
  • Daily English breakfast
Valid anytime, subject to availability.
Must book a "1 Night Spa Break" rate category to qualify. Must book spa treatments in advance by contacting the hotel using the number on the reservation confirmation received after booking. Other restrictions may apply.

1903142.qualifier:
2-Night Spa Break - Rate includes the following:
  • Accommodations as selected
  • Two 45-minute treatments per guest at The Bath House on site
  • Daily two-course lunch
  • English breakfast
Valid anytime, subject to availability.
Must book a "2 Night Spa Break" rate category to qualify. Minimum two-night stay required. Must book spa treatments in advance by contacting the hotel using the number on the reservation confirmation received after booking. Other restrictions may apply.

description:
Location.
This Bath hotel is across from the Botanical Gardens and within one-quarter kilometer of the Royal Crescent and Royal Victoria Park.

Hotel Features.
Royal Crescent Hotel has a health club, a steam room, and a sauna. The onsite spa offers massage and treatment rooms and beauty services. Royal Crescent Hotel offers a restaurant, a bar/lounge, and 24-hour room service.

Guestrooms.
Amenities featured in guestrooms include free WiFi, DVD players, air conditioning, and minibars. Bathrooms feature bathroom phones, bathrobes, and free designer toiletries.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Location.
This Bath hotel is across from the Botanical Gardens and within one-quarter kilometer of the Royal Crescent and Royal Victoria Park.

Hotel Features.
Royal Crescent Hotel has a health club, a steam room, and a sauna. The onsite spa offers massage and treatment rooms and beauty services. Royal Crescent Hotel offers a restaurant, a bar/lounge, and 24-hour room service.

Guestrooms.
Amenities featured in guestrooms include free WiFi, DVD players, air conditioning, and minibars. Bathrooms feature bathroom phones, bathrobes, and free designer toiletries.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The Spa & Bath House at the Royal Crescent Hotel is located next to the Dower House Restaurant at the end of the garden in one of the converted coach houses. Spa facilities include a relaxation pool, wooden hot and cool tubs, steam room and sauna. Treatments include reflexology, Thai massage, shiatsu, reiki, Indian head massage, algae and other body wraps (reservations are recommended for all treatments). There is a gymnasium with cardiovascular equipment and weights machines, and classes including yoga, Pilates and qi-gong. The hotel has a landscaped English garden where guests can play croquet on the lawn during the warmer months.

The hotel has two drawing rooms with period furniture and decor, one of which is a library or reading room. There is also a meeting room catering for dinners or meetings for up to 10 people. Suites can also be used for meetings.


Children over 12 years of age are welcome in The Bath House when accompanied by an adult. To use the gym and take treatments, children must be over 16 years of age.

DINING.value: The Dower House - Uber-chic bar and restaurant, serving innovative dishes in a venue converted from one of the property's coach houses. Reservations are recommended.

RECREATION.value: The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Royal Crescent Hotel is Bristol (BRS-Bristol Intl.) - 23.3 km / 14.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
In city centre
Occupying two honey-colored, 18th-century houses in the heart of Bath, this historic hotel is across from the Botanical Gardens and a quarter of a mile from the Jane Austen Centre.

AWARDS_AND_AFFILIATIONS.value: • The property is a member of Relais & Chateaux.

RENOVATION_NOTICE.value:
The hotel will be renovating from 29 March 2016 to 12 May 2016 (completion date subject to change). The following areas are affected:
  • Sauna
  • Spa
  • Spa tub
  • Swimming pool

During renovations, the hotel will make every effort to minimize noise and disturbance.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value: • This property allows pets in specific rooms only (surcharges apply and can be found in the Fees section). Guests can request one of these rooms by contacting the property directly, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Pet deposit: GBP 30 per stay
  • Pet fee: GBP 30 per pet, per stay (maximum GBP 60 per stay)
  • Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

TAGLINE.value: Luxury hotel with spa, near Royal Crescent

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Royal Crescent Hotel offers an airport shuttle and a great location, putting you within just a 10-minute walk of Royal Crescent and No. 1 Royal Crescent. You can grab a bite to eat at the restaurant and visit the spa to be pampered with hot stone massages, detox wraps, or aromatherapy. A bar/lounge and a health club are offered, and rooms at this luxurious hotel get the details right with bathrobes and slippers.

POLICIES.value: For bookings of 4 nights or more, cancellation is allowed until 4 PM, 7 days prior to arrival to avoid the charge of 3 nights including tax. No-show fee is 3 nights including tax. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.
